last_episode_to_air.name: System Cash
last_episode_to_air.overview: Samantha has spent the remaining budget of the media club on expensive furniture, and the gang must scramble to do some fund raising.

name: System Crash
overview:
System Crash was a television show on YTV about a group of students in a media club telling the events of their fictional school, Lambton High, in the past week.

The show was of the sketch comedy genre, with many short segments. Each episode usually had a theme, i.e. parents. Many of the recurring sketches had familiar titles such as Fly on the Wall, Sports Update, Burnbaum Helps, and Lambton Home Shopping.

episodes.name: Back To School
episodes.overview: First day of school at Lambton Junior High, where the members of the media club lampoon student life through their own closed circuit TV show.

episodes.name: Politics And Power
episodes.overview: Kyle campaigns against Brian Maloney for a spot on Lambton's Student Council.

episodes.name: Health And Fitness
episodes.overview: ""Health Week"" has the gang exploring how to eat properly and stay in shape.

episodes.name: Supernatural
episodes.overview: Ghouls and goblins roam the halls of Lambton when the gang suspects their school is haunted.

episodes.name: Love And Romance
episodes.overview: The Valentine's Day Dance brings out feelings of love in the students of Lambton.

episodes.name: Luck And Superstition
episodes.overview: St. Patrick's Day makes some students at Lambton Junior High feel just a little bit lucky.

episodes.name: Sports
episodes.overview: Tiffany Mendelson's Bat Mitzvah has the gang thinking about leaving their childhood behind.

episodes.name: Cyberworld
episodes.overview: The Valentine's Day Dance brings out feelings of love in the students of Lambton.

episodes.name: Growing Up
episodes.overview: The gang explores feelings of jealousy and rivalry.

episodes.name: Rivalries And Competition
episodes.overview: The gang explores feelings of jealousy and rivalry.

episodes.name: Jobs And Responsibilities
episodes.overview: The Young Achiever's Fair causes the gang to take a closer look at jobs & responsibility.

episodes.name: Celebrity
episodes.overview: Star mania hits Lambton as the school play brings out the best â€“ and the worst â€“ in the students.

episodes.name: Parents
episodes.overview: Parent/Teacher Interview week has the gang exploring their relationship with their parents.

episodes.name: Crime And Punishment
episodes.overview: Burnbaum's mother takes over the school as Vice Principal and turns Lambton Junior High into a prison! The punishment theme is explored further, culminating in a prison movie parody, ""Lambton Detention Express"".

episodes.name: Self-Improvement
episodes.overview: The whole school is freaking out when it's Yearbook picture day, and everyone scrambles to look half decent for posterity. Beau tries to sell a home liposuction kit on his Shopping Channel.

episodes.name: Popularity
episodes.overview: School uniforms are introduced so everyone looks the same. Zoe launches a protest against it and craziness ensues. Tek is ""dissed"" by the most popular girl in school on his ""Tek's Niche"" program.

episodes.name: School Safety
episodes.overview: Ridiculous new harsh safety rules are enforced in the school where even teeth are removed as dangerous weapons! Burnbaum stars in a bloody sequel to Shakespeare's ""Macbeth""!

episodes.name: Love, Exciting And New
episodes.overview: Another school dance, and everyone's love problems get revealed. The gang don't have dates and decide to go as a group of losers! A new product called the ""Babe Magnet"" attracts women with the flick of a switch!

episodes.name: Summer Loving, Had Us A Crash
episodes.overview: From the beach, the gang recap what weird stuff happened during their summer vacations, and introduce a new media club member, Chuck.

episodes.name: Chromosome Wars
episodes.overview: Zoe tries to get girls to take science courses, the boys are forced to relieve themselves in an outhouse, and the battle of the sexes breaks out.

episodes.name: Broken (Slightly Cracked) Families
episodes.overview: A field trip to the museum goes insanely wrong with parent chaperones.

episodes.name: Raging Hormones
episodes.overview: Puberty Class starts in school, and Zoe and Burnbaum fall in love.

episodes.name: Bully For You
episodes.overview: A mysterious bully haunts the school as the gang explores the topic of bullying.

episodes.name: Slack-tose Intolerant
episodes.overview: The gang get their term report cards, and explore the topic of laziness.

episodes.name: Boo! The Halloween Show
episodes.overview: At night, during the Halloween dance, the gang wait vigil for Corky, the ghost of a former angry Lambton girl.

episodes.name: Sleazy Does It
episodes.overview: The gang explore sleaze at corruption as a Mexican Fast Food Joint opens in the school cafeteria.

episodes.name: Double Clique-ing
episodes.overview: Bridget leaves the media club for greener pastures, as the gang explores the topic of fitting in and cliques.

episodes.name: All's Well That Trends Well
episodes.overview: The gang is outfitted with clothing from a slimy sports company, and learn about marketing and trends.

episodes.name: The Loser Is...
episodes.overview: The gang explores the topic of competition as their show is nominated for a big TV award.

episodes.name: All Stressed Out (And No Place To Go)
episodes.overview: The gang explore the topic of stress as the all freak out before the big test.

episodes.name: Season's Greed-ings
episodes.overview: The gang explores greed in this Christmas episode after Zoe gives them some lame presents during a gift exchange.

episodes.name: Good Deeds Done Cheap
episodes.overview: ZoÃ« and the rest of the club have a show down with another gang to do the same good deed of cleaning the beach.

episodes.name: Them's Good Eats
episodes.overview: The gang protests for the return of their fries and gravy after a corrupt health food company takes over the school's menu.

episodes.name: With Friends Like These...
episodes.overview: The gang welcomes a visiting Junior High media club from Peru, and go through some rocky times with their new pals.

episodes.name: Survival Of The Kid-est
episodes.overview: Lambton students are sent on a school camping trip in the woods and end up voting someone ""off the island"".

episodes.name: Memories: The Yearbook
episodes.overview: Lambton media club makes a video yearbook with disastrous results and goes back in time to meet its first grads.

episodes.name: Internet Killed TV Star
episodes.overview: The Lambton media club is shocked when their rival club creates an internet webcast. How will they compete with that?

episodes.name: Sweet Smell Of Obsessed
episodes.overview: The gang faces a number of obsessions with food, collectibles, cleanliness and tries to remedy the situations.

episodes.name: Chariots Of Choir
episodes.overview: Lambton's choir competes against the evil private school from Forsaken Manor and chaos ensues.

episodes.name: Culture Vultures
episodes.overview: The media club is censored by the school board and the gang fights back with hilarious results.

episodes.name: Love Is In Theâ€¦Where?
episodes.overview: Everybody acts differently after a rumour spreads about Samantha and Beau having a fling.

episodes.name: A Very Special After School Special
episodes.overview: The gang takes a look at what kids do after a day of classes.

episodes.name: My Not-So-Secret Identity
episodes.overview: Beau decides to change his squeaky clean image by becoming a bitter punk rocker.

episodes.name: System Cash
episodes.overview: Samantha has spent the remaining budget of the media club on expensive furniture, and the gang must scramble to do some fund raising.
